data.title: Career opportunities
data.meta_description: USPS offers a wide range of career opportunities that offer promotion and benefits. Many positions are open including professional and field positions - see which one is right for you.
data.meta_site_name: Careers at the U.S. Postal Service
data.text:
We are now hiring!

We offer a variety of challenging and rewarding opportunities nationwide with over 2,000 job functions that provide room for growth and promotion. The positions listed are recruited the most and so are the best opportunities for employment with USPS right now. Openings will continue to be announced on a rolling basis throughout the year.

Learn about working at USPS

We offer our team variety, training, and ways to move up. USPS is a great place for self-motivated individuals who enjoy serving our communities.

Compensation & benefits | Career development | Diversity & inclusion

Apply now
